text:
MINISTRY OF MINES AND ENERGY

PETROLEUM (EXPLORATION AND PRODUCTION) ACT, 1991 PETROLEUM (TAXATION) ACT, 1991

PETROLEUM EXPLORATION LICENCE
[Petroleum Exploration and Production Act, 1991, Clause 29]
\begin{tabular}{|ll|}
 
PETROLEUM EXPLORATION LICENCE & Licence No. 0073 \\
 
Name of licence-holder & RECONNAISSANCE ENERGY NAMIBIA PTY (LTD) (90\%) \\
 & NATIONAL PETROLEUM CORPORATION OF NAMIBIA (10\%) \\
 
Physical Address & Postal address \\
 
FELD ECKE BUILDING UNIT 3 C/O FELD STREET \& RIEK VAN DER WALT STREET & P.O. BOX 2393 WINDHOEK NAMIBIA \\
 
Duration of Exploration Licence & Licence area location: \\
Four (4) years subject to renewal & Over the Blocks 1719, 1720, 1819, 1820, 1721 AND 1821 - Owambo Basin \\
 
\multicolumn{2}{l}{Conditions applicable to licence:} \\
\multicolumn{2}{l}{Petroleum Exploration and Production Act, 1991, Clause 38 and terms of Petroleum Agreement dated 26 of January, 2015.} \\
 
Date of issue of licence & 29 January 2015 \\
 
\multicolumn{2}{l}{Issued by the Commissioner for Petroleum Affairs in the Ministry of Mines and Energy in terms of Petroleum Exploration and Production Act, 1991, Clause 34 (1), on 29th of January 2015, Place: Windhoek, Namibia Commissioner for Petroleum Affairs: Ministry of Mines and Energy}
 
\end{tabular}

This licence is issued without alterations or corrections and remains the property of the Ministry of Mines and Energy.

CONDITIONS APPLICABLE TO PETROLEUM EXPLORATION LICENCE

General Conditions
1. The Petroleum Exploration Licence-holder must at all times comply with the Petroleum (Exploration and Production) Act, 1991 Petroleum Taxation Act, 1991 and all other applicable laws, including laws relating to labour, safety, hazardous substances, security, health and environment.
2. The Petroleum Exploration Licence-holder has exclusive exploration rights in terms of Petroleum (Exploration and Production) Act, 1991, Clause 29 (1) and (2).
3. The holder of the Petroleum Exploration Licence conduct its operation in compliance with the Petroleum (Exploration and Production) Act, 1991 Clause 16 under any terms and conditions of this Licence.
4. The holder of the Petroleum Exploration Licence is obliged to conduct the exploration activities in terms of Petroleum (Exploration and Production) Act, 1991. Clause 38 (1).
5. The duration of this Licence is subject to the provision of the Petroleum (Exploration and Production) Act, 1991, Clause 30.
6. An application for renewal of Exploration Licence shall be in terms of Petroleum (Exploration and Production) Act, 1991, Clause 33 (1).
7. Annual charges payable by holders of Exploration Licence in terms of Petroleum (Exploration and Production) Act, 1991, Clause 67 (1) apply.

Special Conditions

The Licence Area includes an area consisting of 25341.33 square kilometres within Namibian Blocks 1719, 1720 , 1819.1820,1721 and 1821.

The coordinates of the Licence Area are described by corner point description:
